**Summary**
• Bitcoin holds at $112K, showing strength.
• XRP and SOL prices steady, no big moves.
• Rate cut hopes keep the market buzzing.

Impact — Bitcoin’s stability and lingering rate cut optimism could boost crypto confidence ahead of key economic data releases.

────────────────────────────────
